about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: If you see orange construction signs and cones on a freeway, you must:

about.name: If you see orange construction signs and cones on a freeway, you must:

hasPart.assesses: If you see orange construction signs and cones on a freeway, you must: | If you see orange construction signs and cones on a freeway, you must: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: As you enter a work zone, signs and message boards will warn you of workers, slow-moving equipment, and/or closed lanes ahead. You should reduce your speed and be prepared to slow down or stop.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down because the lane ends ahead.

comment.text: Slow down because the lane ends ahead.

suggestedAnswer.text: Be prepared for workers and equipment ahead.

comment.text: Be prepared for workers and equipment ahead.

suggestedAnswer.text: Change lanes and maintain your current speed.

comment.text: Change lanes and maintain your current speed.

acceptedAnswer.text: Be prepared for workers and equipment ahead.

comment.text: Be prepared for workers and equipment ahead.

answerExplanation.text: As you enter a work zone, signs and message boards will warn you of workers, slow-moving equipment, and/or closed lanes ahead. You should reduce your speed and be prepared to slow down or stop.

comment.text: If you see orange construction signs and cones on a freeway, you must: | As you enter a work zone, signs and message boards will warn you of workers, slow-moving equipment, and/or closed lanes ahead. You should reduce your speed and be prepared to slow down or stop.

hasPart.name: When using a roundabout, drivers should:

about.name: When using a roundabout, drivers should:

hasPart.assesses: When using a roundabout, drivers should: | When using a roundabout, drivers should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A roundabout is a circular intersection that usually does not include a traffic signal and flows in a counterclockwise direction around a central island. Motorists must enter from the right, yielding to traffic already in the roundabout, and follow the circle to the right until the desired roadway is reached.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop in the middle of the roundabout.

comment.text: Stop in the middle of the roundabout.

suggestedAnswer.text: Yield to traffic already in the roundabout.

comment.text: Yield to traffic already in the roundabout.
Yield to entering traffic.

acceptedAnswer.text: Yield to traffic already in the roundabout.

comment.text: Yield to traffic already in the roundabout.

answerExplanation.text: A roundabout is a circular intersection that usually does not include a traffic signal and flows in a counterclockwise direction around a central island. Motorists must enter from the right, yielding to traffic already in the roundabout, and follow the circle to the right until the desired roadway is reached.

comment.text: When using a roundabout, drivers should: | A roundabout is a circular intersection that usually does not include a traffic signal and flows in a counterclockwise direction around a central island. Motorists must enter from the right, yielding to traffic already in the roundabout, and follow the circle to the right until the desired roadway is reached.

hasPart.name: This white sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This white sign means: | This white sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When approaching a railroad crossing, you must look, listen, slow down, and prepare to stop. Let any trains pass before you proceed.

suggestedAnswer.text: The railroad crossing is controlled. Continue at your regular speed.

comment.text: The railroad crossing is controlled. Continue at your regular speed.

suggestedAnswer.text: Look, listen, and prepare to stop at the crossing if necessary.

comment.text: Look, listen, and prepare to stop at the crossing if necessary.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop at the railroad tracks and wait for a signal before crossing.

comment.text: Stop at the railroad tracks and wait for a signal before crossing.

acceptedAnswer.text: Look, listen, and prepare to stop at the crossing if necessary.

comment.text: Look, listen, and prepare to stop at the crossing if necessary.

answerExplanation.text: When approaching a railroad crossing, you must look, listen, slow down, and prepare to stop. Let any trains pass before you proceed.

comment.text: This white sign means: | When approaching a railroad crossing, you must look, listen, slow down, and prepare to stop. Let any trains pass before you proceed.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: This white sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions

hasPart.name: Which of these statements is true about drinking alcohol and driving?

about.name: Which of these statements is true about drinking alcohol and driving?

hasPart.assesses: Which of these statements is true about drinking alcohol and driving? | Which of these statements is true about drinking alcohol and driving? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Being under the influence of alcohol affects your judgment. Good judgement is necessary to react appropriately to things that you see or hear while on the road. Even if you are below the legal blood alcohol limit, consuming any amount of alcohol is likely to affect your ability to drive safely.

suggestedAnswer.text: If you can walk in a straight line after drinking, it is safe to drive.

comment.text: If you can walk in a straight line after drinking, it is safe to drive.

suggestedAnswer.text: If you are under the legal blood alcohol concentration limit, your driving isn't impaired.

comment.text: If you are under the legal blood alcohol concentration limit, your driving isn't impaired.

suggestedAnswer.text: Alcohol affects judgement, which is needed to drive safely.

comment.text: Alcohol affects judgement, which is needed to drive safely.

acceptedAnswer.text: Alcohol affects judgement, which is needed to drive safely.

comment.text: Alcohol affects judgement, which is needed to drive safely.

answerExplanation.text: Being under the influence of alcohol affects your judgment. Good judgement is necessary to react appropriately to things that you see or hear while on the road. Even if you are below the legal blood alcohol limit, consuming any amount of alcohol is likely to affect your ability to drive safely.

comment.text: Which of these statements is true about drinking alcohol and driving? | Being under the influence of alcohol affects your judgment. Good judgement is necessary to react appropriately to things that you see or hear while on the road. Even if you are below the legal blood alcohol limit, consuming any amount of alcohol is likely to affect your ability to drive safely.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: Which of these statements is true about drinking alcohol and driving? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
educationalAlignment.targetName: Which of these statements is true about drinking alcohol and driving?

hasPart.name: When merging onto the freeway, you should be driving:

about.name: When merging onto the freeway, you should be driving:

hasPart.assesses: When merging onto the freeway, you should be driving: | When merging onto the freeway, you should be driving: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You should enter a freeway at or near the speed of traffic, unless the speed of traffic exceeds the legal speed limit.

suggestedAnswer.text: At or near the speed of the freeway traffic.

comment.text: At or near the speed of the freeway traffic.
At the legal speed limit.

suggestedAnswer.text: More slowly than the freeway traffic.

comment.text: More slowly than the freeway traffic.

acceptedAnswer.text: At or near the speed of the freeway traffic.

comment.text: At or near the speed of the freeway traffic.

answerExplanation.text: You should enter a freeway at or near the speed of traffic, unless the speed of traffic exceeds the legal speed limit.

comment.text: When merging onto the freeway, you should be driving: | You should enter a freeway at or near the speed of traffic, unless the speed of traffic exceeds the legal speed limit.

hasPart.name: This road sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This road sign means: | This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns the driver that there is an upcoming winding road. Speed should be adjusted appropriately.

suggestedAnswer.text: Sharp turn to the right ahead.

comment.text: Sharp turn to the right ahead.

suggestedAnswer.text: Upcoming sharp left and right turns.

comment.text: Upcoming sharp left and right turns.
Winding road ahead.
Winding road ahead.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns the driver that there is an upcoming winding road. Speed should be adjusted appropriately.

comment.text: This road sign means: | Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns the driver that there is an upcoming winding road. Speed should be adjusted appropriately.
